{{ml_birc}}

This function is used to create an {{ml_birc|ircbot}} which are the basis of the module. {{ml_birc|ircRegister}} is automatically executed for created bot for the current resource after bot creation.

==Syntax== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
ircbot ircCreateBot ( string botName )
</syntaxhighlight> 

===Required Arguments=== 
*'''botName:''' The name that ircbot will receive.
:'''Note:''' Validity of the bot names are not checked. Make sure you enter a name the server you are connecting to accepts.

===Returns===
Returns the {{ml_birc|ircbot}} pointer if passed arguments were valid, ''false'' otherwise.

==Example==
This example creates an ircbot called ''DummyBot'' and stores it to variable theBot on resource start.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function resourceStart()
    theBot = ircCreateBot ( "DummyBot" )
end
addEventHandler ( "onResourceStart", getResourceRootElement (), resourceStart )
</syntaxhighlight>
